description: A prodigy detective of the Tenryou Commission, Heizou is an Anemo catalyst user who excels at close-range combat and Swirl reactions.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

talents: Normal Attack: Fudou Style Martial Arts
info: Heizou is a 4★ Anemo catalyst DPS/support who excels at close-range combat and Swirl reactions. Build him for CRIT, ATK%, and Elemental Mastery.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Fudou Style Martial Arts
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 fisticuffs empowered by Anemo.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 fisticuffs empowered by Anemo.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash a powerful Anemo punch.
Plunging Attack
Heizou plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Anemo DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Heartstopper Strike
skills.desc: Heizou winds up and delivers a powerful Anemo punch. Hold: Charges up, increasing DMG and granting Declension stacks. At 4 stacks, gains Conviction, further increasing DMG.
skills.details_html:
Heartstopper Strike
Winds up and delivers a powerful Anemo punch. Hold: Charges up, increasing DMG and granting Declension stacks. At 4 stacks, gains Conviction, further increasing DMG.

skills.name: Windmuster Kick
skills.desc: Heizou launches a powerful kick, creating a Windmuster vortex that pulls in enemies and deals AoE Anemo DMG. Swirls with elements present.
skills.details_html:
Windmuster Kick
Launches a powerful kick, creating a Windmuster vortex that pulls in enemies and deals AoE Anemo DMG. Swirls with elements present.

passive_talents.name: Pre-Existing Guilt
passive_talents.desc: Increases Heartstopper Strike's Declension stacks by 1 when Heizou triggers a Swirl reaction.

passive_talents.name: Paradoxical Practice
passive_talents.desc: After Heizou triggers a Swirl reaction, increases Elemental Mastery by 80 for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Detective's Instinct
passive_talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Inazuma on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Named Juvenile Casebook
constellations.desc: Heizou's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15% for 5s after using Heartstopper Strike.

constellations.name: Investigative Collection
constellations.desc: The pull effect of Windmuster Kick is enhanced and its duration is increased by 1s.

constellations.name: Esoteric Puzzle Book
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Heartstopper Strike by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Tome of Lies
constellations.desc: The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each Windmuster Kick regenerates 9 Energy for Heizou.

constellations.name: Secret Archive
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Windmuster Kick by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Curious Casefiles
constellations.desc: Each Declension stack increases the CRIT Rate of Heartstopper Strike by 4%. When Heizou has Conviction, Heartstopper Strike's CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.
